put.summary:
Updates guest details in the PMS (OTA)
Fields required for guest update:
- UniqueID.ID - GuestID
Fields available to update:
- ProfileModify.Customer.Address.AddressLine
- ProfileModify.Customer.Address.CityName
- ProfileModify.Customer.Address.CountryName - ISO 3 letter code
- ProfileModify.Customer.Address.PostalCode
- ProfileModify.Customer.Address.StateProv
- ProfileModify.Customer.BirthDate
- ProfileModify.Customer.Document.DocID
- ProfileModify.Customer.Document.DocType - needs to be 1 (Passport) 2 (Identity Card)
- ProfileModify.Customer.Email
- ProfileModify.Customer.PersonName.GivenName
- ProfileModify.Customer.PersonName.Surname
- ProfileModify.Customer.Telephone.PhoneNumber
- ProfileModify.Customer.CitizenCountryName.Code

get.summary: returns the available items of the POS menu

post.summary: creates bon in the pms system

put.description:
Although the method allows the caller sending multiple reservations, only the first reservation
is the one that will be checked in.

put.summary:
This will change reservation status from “Reserved” to “Arrived”.
“Arrived” status represents a reservation that its guest has arrived to the hotel but still dosent received a room.
This action will also change the folio status to open and in some
Optima instances will send a sms to the guest when his room will be available.

post.summary: This action was changed to POST from GET becuase of the complexity of the OTA object

put.description:
Although the method allows the caller sending multiple reservations, only the first reservation
is the one that will be checked out.

put.summary:
Patch method.
Required fields:
- HotelReservations.HotelReservation[].UniqueID.ID: reservation ID
Fields available to update:
- HotelReservations.HotelReservation[].ResGuests.ResGuest[].ArrivalTime - in the format of timeSpan "12:34"
- HotelReservations.HotelReservation[].ResGlobalInfo.Comments.Commnet[].Text - the new comment text will be added to the existing comments

post.summary:
Relates a file to optima reservation. the file sent needs to be in the base64 string format.
Required fields:
- FileAttachmentReferences.FileAttachmentReference[].ContentData - base64 string data content.
- TPA_Extensions.Silverbyte_UniqueID - the reservatino ID.
Optional fields:
- FileAttachmentReferences.FileAttachmentReference[].FileName - the file name.

when using this method a debit transaction will be created. (STUB)
FolioID - Posting.Transaction.RevenueDetails.RevenueDetail[].FolioIDs.FolioID[]
TransactionCodeID - Posting.Transaction.RevenueDetails.RevenueDetail[].Silverbyte_TransactionCodeID
CurrencyCode - Posting.Transaction.RevenueDetails.RevenueDetail[].CurrencyCode
Amount - Posting.Transaction.RevenueDetails.RevenueDetail[].ExtendedPrice.AmountBeforeTax / AmountAfterTax
Quantity - Posting.Transaction.RevenueDetails.RevenueDetail[].ExtendedPrice.Quantity

FolioID - StayInfo.RevenueCategories.RevenueCategory[].RevenueDetails.RevenueDetail[].FolioIDs.FolioID[]
TransactionCodeID - Silverbyte_TransactionCode
CurrencyCode - StayInfo.HotelReservation.RoomStays.RoomStay[].RoomRates.RoomRate[].Total.CurrencyCodeName - ISO 4217 3 Chars
Amount - StayInfo.HotelReservation.RoomStays.RoomStay[].RoomRates.RoomRate[].Total.AmountBeforeTax / AmountAfterTax
Voucher - AuthorizationDetail.CreditCardAuthorization.ID.ID

get.summary:
get the reservation folios from the PMS
Pass the reservationID in "request.uniqueID.id"
Pass the requested currency in "request.silverbyte_CurrencyCode"

put.summary: Reroutes folio charges to new folio

post.summary:
Returns the reservation's future value
usally used before reservation check to calculate the price

Used to add special services / addons to a reservation.
Currently only supporting add of a special service, no update or delete.

Used to add special services / addons to a reservation.
Currently only supporting add of a special service, no update or delete.
